thread.section_title: Hotel Le Clos Medicis - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Half-term break
thread.title_full: Half-term break - Review of Hotel Le Clos Medicis, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jeremy J
title: Half-term break
text:
We recently stayed at this hotel for a family holiday. There were two adults and four children from 7 to 16. It is in a nice location near the Sorbonne and very close to the RER stop. It is walking distance to Notre Dame, the Pantheon and the Parc du Luxembourg. The rooms, although a little on the small side, were very pleasant and clean and had very comfortable beds. The staff were very friendly and helpful. If you are looking for a well placed, friendly and good value hotel this would fit the bill nicely.
